title: Exquisite Ruby & Diamond Nakshi Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Pink Tourmaline Beads. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This haaram showcases intricate Nakshi work, a traditional South Indian technique known for its detailed carving and embossing. The central pendant features a striking pear-shaped ruby, surrounded by vibrant emeralds. The necklace is adorned with delicate diamond-studded floral motifs, culminating in elegant pink tourmaline bead drops. The piece is meticulously crafted with a focus on symmetry and balance, ensuring a comfortable and graceful fit.
colors: Pink (Tourmaline). Secondary: Hints of antique gold finish in the Nakshi work.

description: This haaram is a testament to the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry making. The intricate Nakshi work and the use of high-quality gemstones make it a truly exceptional piece.
